dcterms:creator: Roberto Olmos
Siham Tabik
Francisco Herrera
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 2199 images of people using guns or phones in real-world scenarios, labeled with bounding boxes for hands, phones, and guns. The images were collected from YouTube videos.
dcterms:title: Hands Guns and Phones (HGP) Dataset

dcterms:creator: Roberto Olmos
Siham Tabik
Francisco Herrera
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 5960 video frames from 50 videos, labeled with bounding boxes for hands, phones, and guns. The dataset includes various scenarios such as shooting drills and armed robberies.
dcterms:title: Temporal Hands Guns and Phones (THGP) Dataset
